summary: During WW2, American General Worden orders Major Reisman to pick 12 soldiers from the military prison for the dangerous mission of killing a Nazi General.
cast: Lee Marvin|Ernest Borgnine|Ken Wahl|Larry Wilcox|Sonny Landham|Richard Jaeckel|Wolf Kahler|Gavan O'Herlihy|Ricco Ross|Stephen Hattersley|Rolf Saxon|Jay Benedict|Michael John Paliotti|Paul Herzberg|Jeff Harding|Sam Douglas|Russell Sommers|Michael Sheard|Bruce Boa|John Malcolm|William Morgan Sheppard|Crispin Denys|Denis Holmes|Alan Barry|Don Fellows|Billy Dean|Mike Kent|Charles Bodycomb|Jim Dowdall|Derek Lyons
title: Doce del patíbulo: la siguiente misión
